metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30596 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Incorrect security UI in Navigation in Google Chrome on Android prior to92.0.4515.131 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '92.0.4515.159-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
